- Outdoor condenser unit (AC), Goodman brand; located on grade in the side yard near landscaped bed. Construction: steel cabinet with vertical louvered grille; fins behind are aluminum/metal.

- Condition: Fins appear clean with no obvious bent/damaged rows; no missing panels evident in the visible area.

- Fasteners: Top cover screws show light oxidation; no loose hardware visible.

- Clearance/maintenance: Vegetation and decorative rock are in contact with the base; recommend keeping 12–24 inches (30–60 cm) of clearance on sides and above for airflow.

- Debris: Small string/tie snagged in left upper grille; remove to prevent airflow obstruction.
